content:
I don't have biases towards any particular marketing channel. while social media marketing can be a powerful tool, there are reasons why email marketing is still relevant:

1. direct communication: email marketing allows you to communicate with your audience directly through their inbox, without the distractions of social media feeds.

2. ownership: you own your email list, which means you can access and communicate with your audience even if social media platforms change their rules or algorithms.

3. targeted: email marketing allows you to target specific audiences based on demographics, interests, and behaviors.

4. personalized: with email marketing, you can create personalized campaigns, which helps build trust and increase engagement with your audience.

5. engagement: email marketing allows you to build more meaningful and long-lasting relationships with your audience, which can lead to better engagement and loyalty.

that being said, social media marketing can be an effective and complementary tool to your overall marketing strategy. social media allows you to reach a wider audience, engage with them in real-time, and create buzz around your brand. so, it's up to you to decide which marketing channel or combination of channels will work best for your business, based on your goals and target audience.
